Index#

Note: index<N>, index_c<N>, and index_v<N> are contained in namespace hyperion::mpl

template<usize N>
struct index : public boost::hana::integral_constant<usize, N>#

Basic meta-programming index type.

Template Parameters

N – The index

template<usize N>
static constexpr auto hyperion::mpl::index_c = index<N>{}#

Instance of the Hyperion basic meta-programming index type.

Template Parameters

N – The index

template<usize N>
static constexpr usize hyperion::mpl::index_v = index<N>::value#

Value of mpl::index
